sentences.en: ‘Jack will never agree to that,’ he said with assurance.

sentences.en: He answered all the questions with assurance.
sentences.cn: 他很有把握地回答了所有的问题.

sentences.en: He gave me a definite assurance that the repairs would be finished tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 他给我确切保证,修理将于明日完工.

sentences.en: He gave me assurance in black and white.

sentences.en: He will have been pleased by Marshal Yazov's assurance of the armed forces' loyalty.

sentences.en: I have full assurance of his honsety.

sentences.en: Masur led the orchestra with assurance.

sentences.en: She said "hi" with the blithe assurance of someone who knew how much she'd been missed.
